document_data.name: Aphelda's Vendor Golem
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aphelda's vendor golem''''' was a [[construct]] creature what was capable of functioning as a shopkeep on behalf of its creator.
document_data.Description: A vendor golem performed all tasks that a real shopkeep did on a daily basis. They could purchase, sell, and haggle over the store's stock. Skilled [[wizard]] store keeps left these strange creatures in charge of their stores. ''[[Leomund's merchant elemental]]'' was a similar creature and a viable alternative. Some claimed that unlike [[Leomund]]'s [[elemental]], [[Aphelda]]'s construct was a mercantile pushover.
